Action.Src: szSapSrxPatchLevel = NwEngine.Variables.GetValue("SapSrxPatchLevel") NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SAP SRX Script: Variable SapSrxPatchLevel has the value <" & szSapSrxPatchLevel & ">" If szSapSrxPatchLevel <> "" And szSapSrxPatchLevel <> "0" Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SAP SRX Script: Checking Variable SapSrxPatchLevel: Patch found." szSrxPatchLevelText = " (Patch " & szSapSrxPatchLevel & ")" NWEngine.Variables.InsertVariable "SrxPatchLevel", szSrxPatchLevelText Else NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SAP SRX Script: Checking Variable SapSrxPatchLevel: No Patch found." NWEngine.Variables.InsertVariable "SrxPatchLevel", "" End If

Component.Name: SRX Global Files for version 17 and higher

Action.Src:
Option Explicit
Dim objDefaultJss, strJawsVersion, szDefaultJss, szJssFile Set objDefaultJss = CreateObject("NwSapSetupATLCommon.TextFileParser") NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Adapting changes on %JawsScriptDir%\Scripts\myExtensions.jss for JAWS " + strJawsVersion szJssFile = "%JawsScriptDir%\Scripts\myExtensions.jss"
szDefaultJss = NWEngine.Variables.ResolveString(szJssFile) If objDefaultJss.Parse( szDefaultJss ) Then NWEngine.Context.Log.Write "Script action: Open and modify the file " & Chr(34) & szDefaultJss & Chr(34) If Not objDefaultJss.DoesStringExist("saputils.jsb") Then NWEngine.Context.Log.Write "Script action: Appending lines..." objDefaultJss.AppendLine "; SAP specific" objDefaultJss.AppendLine "use " & Chr(34) & "saputils.jsb" & Chr(34) objDefaultJss.AppendLine "; end SAP specific" End If objDefaultJss.Save( szDefaultJss ) Else NWEngine.Context.Log.WriteWarning "Script action: Could not open the file " & Chr(34) & szDefaultJss & Chr(34) End If

Option Explicit
Dim objDefaultJss, strJawsVersion, szDefaultJss, szJssFile Set objDefaultJss = CreateObject("NwSapSetupATLCommon.TextFileParser") NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Adapting changes on %JawsScriptDir%\Scripts\myExtensions.jss for JAWS " + strJawsVersion szJssFile = "%JawsScriptDir%\Scripts\myExtensions.jss"
szDefaultJss = NWEngine.Variables.ResolveString(szJssFile) If objDefaultJss.Parse( szDefaultJss ) Then NWEngine.Context.Log.Write "Script action: Open the file " & Chr(34) & szDefaultJss & Chr(34) objDefaultJss.RemoveLine "; SAP specific" objDefaultJss.RemoveLine "use " & Chr(34) & "saputils.jsb" & Chr(34) objDefaultJss.RemoveLine "; end SAP specific" objDefaultJss.Save( szDefaultJss ) End If

Option Explicit
NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Removing .jsb files created during install." Dim fileArray(6), strJawsVersion, scriptPath, filePath, fileItem fileArray(0) = "saputils.jsb" fileArray(1) = "sapfront.jsb" fileArray(2) = "saplogon.jsb" fileArray(3) = "saplgpad.jsb" fileArray(4) = "SapSettings.jsb" fileArray(5) = "NWBC.JSB" fileArray(6) = "gridview.jsb"
NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Retrieving JAWS version..." strJawsVersion = NwEngine.Variables.GetValue("JawsVersion") If strJawsVersion < 17 Then scriptPath = "%JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\enu\" Else scriptPath = "%JawsScriptDir%\Scripts\" End If NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Version " & strJawsVersion & " detected, using path " & scriptPath For Each fileItem in fileArray filePath = NwEngine.Variables.ResolveString(scriptPath & fileItem) NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Checking existence of " & filePath If NwEngine.Shell.FileExist(filePath) Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: File " & filePath & " exists, will be deleted." If NwEngine.Shell.DeleteFile(filePath) Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Successfully deleted file " & filePath Else NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Could not delete file " & filePath End If Else NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: File " & filePath & " doesn't exist!" End If Next

Option Explicit
Dim objDefaultJss, strJawsVersion, szDefaultJss, szJssFile Set objDefaultJss = CreateObject("NwSapSetupATLCommon.TextFileParser") strJawsVersion = NwEngine.Variables.GetValue("JawsVersion") If strJawsVersion < 14 Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Adapting changes on %JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\enu\Default.jss for JAWS " + strJawsVersion szJssFile = "%JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\enu\Default.jss" ElseIf strJawsVersion < 17 Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Adapting changes on %JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\enu\myExtensions.jss for JAWS " + strJawsVersion szJssFile = "%JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\enu\myExtensions.jss" End If
szDefaultJss = NWEngine.Variables.ResolveString(szJssFile) If objDefaultJss.Parse( szDefaultJss ) Then NWEngine.Context.Log.Write "Script action: Open and modify the file " & Chr(34) & szDefaultJss & Chr(34) If Not objDefaultJss.DoesStringExist("saputils.jsb") Then NWEngine.Context.Log.Write "Script action: Appending lines..." objDefaultJss.AppendLine "; SAP specific" objDefaultJss.AppendLine "use " & Chr(34) & "saputils.jsb" & Chr(34) objDefaultJss.AppendLine "; end SAP specific" End If objDefaultJss.Save( szDefaultJss ) Else NWEngine.Context.Log.WriteWarning "Script action: Could not open the file " & Chr(34) & szDefaultJss & Chr(34) End If

szDefaultJss = NWEngine.Variables.ResolveString(szJssFile) If objDefaultJss.Parse( szDefaultJss ) Then NWEngine.Context.Log.Write "Script action: Open the file " & Chr(34) & szDefaultJss & Chr(34) objDefaultJss.RemoveLine "; SAP specific" objDefaultJss.RemoveLine "use " & Chr(34) & "saputils.jsb" & Chr(34) objDefaultJss.RemoveLine "; end SAP specific" objDefaultJss.Save( szDefaultJss ) End If

Option Explicit
Dim objDefaultJss, strJawsVersion, szDefaultJss, szJssFile Set objDefaultJss = CreateObject("NwSapSetupATLCommon.TextFileParser") strJawsVersion = NwEngine.Variables.GetValue("JawsVersion") If strJawsVersion < 14 Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Adapting changes on %JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\deu\Default.jss for JAWS " + strJawsVersion szJssFile = "%JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\deu\Default.jss" ElseIf strJawsVersion < 17 Then NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: Adapting changes on %JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\deu\myExtensions.jss for JAWS " + strJawsVersion szJssFile = "%JawsScriptDir%\SETTINGS\deu\myExtensions.jss" Else NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SRX Script: No changes needed on JAWS 17 or higher" End If
